title: Redundant complaint about champ select in normals.
body:
Just finished 2 normals, first with rage quitting top laner, second with afk adc. 

Third times a charm, right?

Champ select find two people calling for mid, both refusing to back down.  The conversation was comical, proving neither gave a damn about the team other than getting the role they wanted.  So I waited for them to resolve it, having not picked a champ yet.  It got worse, not better.  I didn't want to play with these two tools, and thus I get punished for not picking a champ.

Screw you mid players.

I don't want anything done, just filling in 6 minutes by having a rant.

I don't care if you're recording, I don't care if you only play mid, I don't care if you just bought a new skin, I really don't care about you at all.  Just accept the call order, it's crap, but its the only thing we have.
